name: Mark Straight
bio: I'm that guy you don't like. I get it. I was a Straight A's guy, the teacher's pet, the goody two shoes. You can probably tell from my photo as well, my hairstyle, my face, you name it. But that doesn't mean you should discriminate against me. Give me a chance. I was always bullied at school, rejected by guys in childhood, rejected by girls in adulthood. Don't reject me now.
